title: #225: Grand Theft World | Richard Grove
description:
Richard Grove could have very easily been killed in the World Trade Center on 9/11 if it hadn’t been for a traffic jam. His employer was, in actuality, trying to kill him, he just didn’t know this rather shocking detail until a few years later. Whistleblowers always pay a price for their heroism.

Now two decades later, Richard is teaching the world how to awaken to what is really happening, not just in the world, but inside themselves. His Autonomy program is helping hundreds of people each year overcome learned helplessness, heighten their self-confidence, and outgrow their fear of scarcity and loss.

His weekly podcast, Grand Theft World, lays out what happened during the past week through a compilation of videos that help to explain where things are headed and how we can adjust accordingly.
